title-group.article-title: Corrigendum: Effect of the gut microbiome, skin microbiome, plasma metabolome, white blood cells subtype, immune cells, inflammatory proteins, and inflammatory cytokines on asthma: a two-sample Mendelian randomized study and mediation analysis

article-meta.related-article: A Corrigendum on Effect of the gut microbiome, skin microbiome, plasma metabolome, white blood cells subtype, immune cells, inflammatory proteins, and inflammatory cytokines on asthma: a two-sample Mendelian randomized study and mediation analysis By Guo W, Hong E, Ma H, Wang J and Wang Q (2025). Front. Immunol. 16:1436888. doi: 10.3389/fimmu.2025.1436888

institution-wrap.institution: National Natural Science Foundation of China

custom-meta.meta-value: Autoimmune and Autoinflammatory Disorders: Autoinflammatory Disorders

body.p: In the published article, there was an error in Affiliation 1. Instead of “College of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Southern Medical University, Guangzhou, China”, it should be “School of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Southern Medical University, Guangzhou, China”.
The authors apologize for this error and state that this does not change the scientific conclusions of the article in any way. The original article has been updated.
